article.Heading: GST implementation: Review meeting in national capital
article.Summary: Cabinet Secretary, PK Sinha is taking stock of the implementation of the GST as we speak. All central government secretaries, as well as CBEC Chairperson, Vanaja Sarna are a part of this review huddle. CNBC-TV18's Timsy Jaipuria was tracking that meet.
article.Body:
Cabinet Secretary, PK Sinha is taking stock of the implementation of the GST as we speak. All central government secretaries, as well as CBEC Chairperson, Vanaja Sarna are a part of this review huddle. CNBC-TV18's Timsy Jaipuria gave us these details.

Watch video for moreâ€¦
